title: Virtual Assistant
job_overview:
Virtual Assistant for Creative Media Company (Remote, Part-Time)

$4/hr | 30 hours/week | Long-term opportunity | Fun, flexible, and fast-paced

I run a growing media company that manages social media, brand content, and creative campaigns for multiple clients — and I am looking for a super organized, proactive Virtual Assistant to help me stay on track and scale smoothly. 

This is a remote, part-time role with lots of potential to grow. If you’re a fast learner, good with social platforms, and love working behind the scenes — this could be for you.

 Responsibilities:
 • Schedule and post social media content (IG, FB, etc.)
 • Organize content folders, Canva files, and client calendars
 • Manage emails, follow-ups, and inbox cleanups
 • Help with client onboarding and file transfers
 • Light research
 • Update spreadsheets, google sheets and track project progress
 • Communicate with me daily 

 Requirements:
 • Strong written English
 • Tech-savvy and quick with tools like Google Drive, Canva, and social media
 • Organized and detail-oriented (you love checklists)
 • Comfortable working independently
 • Available Monday–Friday, 6 hours/day (timezone flexible but preferably pacific time)
 • Reliable internet + personal laptop

Perks:
 • Flexible hours
 • Creative, chill work environment
 • Training and SOPs provided
 • Room to grow with the company

To Apply:

Send a short intro, your availability, and any experience with social media or virtual assistant work. Bonus if you’ve worked with creatives, influencers, or agencies before.
